column5: Beautiful home on secluded cul-de-sac. Enjoy your oasis as it backs to lovely wooded creek. Great location, minutes to downtown Dallas! Large open kitchen with stainless steel appliances and living room that has wood fireplace with gas starter. Huge master suite, double vanities, HUGE walk-in closet. 4 bedrooms (4 queen beds). Backyard features wood deck and pergola overlooking treed creek. Close to White Rock lake & arboretum (3 miles), library & park (0.2 miles), Deep Ellum (7 mins) and I-30.
